essay.question-text: The students discuss a note posted on the door of their classroom. State how they feel about the information included in the note.
essay.sample-answer-text:
SAMPLE ANSWER
In this set of materials, the reading passage is a note on the door of the students' classroom, and the listening passage is a discussion by two students on the note.
According to the reading passage, the note explains that the professor is ill and the students must read three chapters, write three essays, and prepare for a quiz while the professor is absent.
In the listening passage, the students discuss what is included in the note. The man expects to have a break from work because the professor is absent, so he is very unpleasantly surprised when he hears that they have a lot of work to do. Both of the students are surprised at how much work they have to do. They think that it's a huge amount of work and that it's more work than they would have to do if the professor were not absent.
